text: Teenagers as young as 14 and 15 among victims of Swiss bar fire, raising questions about ID checks - CNN
fullText: Teenagers as young as 14 and 15 were among the victims of the deadly fire at a ski resort bar in Crans-Montana, Switzerland, police said Sunday, raising questions about whether sufficient age checks were in place.
